lead_paragraph: Rarely in American history has the exercise of choosing people had such a far-reaching impact on the nature and priorities of a new administration.

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from New York, and Jackie Calmes from Washington.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Hires  to Reveal Path  for Presidency
headline.main: Trump’s Hires Will Set Course of His Presidency

snippet: Rarely in American history has the exercise of choosing people had such a far-reaching impact on the nature and priorities of a new administration....
abstract: Donald Trump's choices for his cabinet will wield outsize influence on direction of his administration, with appointees likely to shape approach of inexperienced president-elect who has espoused contradictory positions on key issues; sharp differences in ideologies of Trump's closest supporters leave future uncertain.
